txt.en: Lúfa is at Ordlac's house in Oserley.\n\nYou should speak with Lúfa before she retires for the evening.
Talk to Lúfa in Ordlac's house
'I cannot thank you enough, [placeholder]! Had you not come, I would have certainly perished!'
Lúfa told you her tale of woe, though she is glad of your company. Nevertheless, you must remain wary for danger.
DNT -- Will not be seen
TBD
'Do you think it true that the enemy shall attempt to take my life tonight? It would be good to know that you will remain with me, then.\n\n'Will you stay and guard the door?'
Lúfa is at Ordlac's house in Oserley.\n\nYou should speak with Lúfa now that you have foiled the attempt upon her life.

You have defended Lúfa from her would-be murderers
Lúfa is at Ordlac's house in Oserley.\n\nYou should speak with Lúfa when you are prepared to defend her against the servants of the White Hand.
You should speak with Lúfa before she retires
'Will you check the door and windows after I retire? Perhaps if they are secured, you will have no need to risk your life on my behalf.'
You should speak with Lúfa before she retires for the evening
The Lady's Champion
Talk to Lúfa when you are ready to defend her
'Do you think it true that the enemy shall attempt to take my life tonight? It would be good to know that you will remain with me, then.\n\n'Will you stay and guard the door?'
